$schema: Color Reference extracted from ColorsView.tsx - Source of Truth
description: Canonical color values from Strata Design System visual documentation. This file serves as the authoritative reference for validating token files.

brand.description: Primary signal color for Strata (Volt Lime)

notes.primary-light: brand-300 (#E6F993) - Primary Brand Color for Light Mode
notes.primary-dark: brand-500 (#C3E433) - Primary Brand Color for Dark Mode

zinc.description: 11-step sharp greyscale foundation for primary backgrounds, borders, and text

red.description: Red spectrum for tertiary data and critical visualizations
red.notes: Only shades 100-500 are displayed in data visualization section. Full palette may exist in tokens.json.

indigo.description: Blue-indigo spectrum optimized for primary data series and main charts
indigo.notes: Only shades 100-500 are displayed in data visualization section. Full palette may exist in tokens.json.

amber.description: Amber-orange spectrum for supplementary data and warm tones
amber.notes: Only shades 100-500 are displayed in data visualization section. Full palette may exist in tokens.json.

green.description: Green palette (emerald) - not fully displayed in ColorsView
green.notes: Referenced in semantic feedback (emerald-600: #10b981) but full palette not displayed. Check tokens.json for complete palette.

blue.description: Blue palette - not fully displayed in ColorsView
blue.notes: Blue palette shown in semantic feedback but uses standard Tailwind values. Skipping validation since not prominently displayed in visual gallery.

validation_rules.brand_primary_light: Must use brand-300 (#E6F993) for primary actions in light mode
validation_rules.brand_primary_dark: Must use brand-500 (#C3E433) for primary actions in dark mode
validation_rules.no_custom_colors: No custom color values allowed outside documented palettes
validation_rules.no_mono_palette: Custom 'mono' palette must not exist - use zinc instead
validation_rules.wcag_compliance: All color combinations must meet WCAG AA minimum contrast requirements
